nodes.text: This ravine was cut into a high mesa on a remote agricultural colony. After a series of disappearances around the ravine, the planet's settlers believed it to be haunted. In fact, the ravine was inhabited by a carnivorous plant, which attacked those that entered its corridors. In 4000 BBY, the Jedi Knight Shalavaa slew the beast, after entering the ravine to investigate the disappearance of a nerf herder.
